src:
Gurović i Zvezda: Ne trebaju mi stres i problemi
01 Nov 2019, 13:37 by Zile
Utakmicu između Crvene zvezde i Himkija u društvu Nebojše Čovića posmatrao je Milan Gurović, dovoljno da krenu priče da je baš on novi trener crveno-belih.
Dan kasnije Gurović je prokomentarisao ove navode i kako stvari stoje, novi trener, ukoliko ga crveno-beli još traže, biće neko drugi.
– Crvena zvezda ima trenera. Andrija Gavrilović radi odličan posao. Što se mene tiče ne znam zašto se to potencira u medijima, ali ja definitivno neću biti novi trener Zvezde, rekao je Gurović za Blicsport.
Novi posao doneo bi sa sobom i dosta stresa, a Guroviću to nije potrebno.
– Imam svoju akademiju, želim da radim sa mlađim kadrovima. Nije mi potreban stres, niti bilo kakvi problemi, zaključio je proslavljeni košarkaš.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Gurovic and Zvezda: I don't need stress and problems
01 Nov 2019, 12:37 by Zile
The match between Red Star and Himki in the company of Nebojsa Covic was watched by Milan Gurovic, enough to tell stories that he was the new coach of the Red and White.
A day later, Gurovic commented on these allegations and how things are going, the new coach, if the red and white are still looking for him, will be someone else.
- The Red Star has a coach. Andrija Gavrilovic does a great job. As for me, I do not know why it is being emphasized in the media, but I will definitely not be the new coach of the Star, Gurovic told Blicsport.
The new job would also bring with it a lot of stress, and Gurović does not need that.
- I have my own academy, I want to work with younger staff. I don't need stress or any problems, the celebrated basketball player concluded.
